mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( notice_title, notice_content, notice_date ) VALUES( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id noticeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_date noticeDate FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
